name: Ocean' Schoolor
description:
Protect the Mermaid !

A mermaid is being attacked by some angry sharks !

Calm down the Sharks by dyeing them with some Squid ink.

Use your pearls to change Squid's color and ink !

The game :
  • A school project for our first game on EU5, we had about 1 month to create it.
Credits :

Disclaimer : There is only the links of the students who worked on the game, other credits are in the game.
